newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Country Heights to acquire land owner.
newsitem.headline: Country Heights to acquire land owner.

text.p: Malaysian property developer Country Heights Holdings Bhd said on Tuesday it plans to acquire the entire issued and paid-up share capital of Medan Indah Sdn Bhd for 235.0 million ringgit in cash.
In a statement, it said land owner Medan Indah will be acquired from Green Water Rock Sdn Bhd.
Medan Indah owns a piece of land measuring 293,735 sq ft in central Selangor state on which an international exhibition and showroom is being built.

Under the proposed acquisition, to be funded by internally generated funds and bank borrowings, Green Water will provide Country Heights a profit guarantee of not less than 25.6 million ringgit a year for two financial years following the completion of the acquisition, the statement said.
It said the proposed acquisition would strengthen the group's recurring income through rental revenue.
The steady recurring stream of income would also provide a buffer for Country Heights against unfavourable cyclical nature of the traditional property development business, it said.
